unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon This Exam Season?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon This Exam Season?**

unnormalised: Are you gearing up for those dreaded exams? Don't sweat it! Exam prep apps are becoming the go-to choice for students across India, from Jammu to Kanyakumari. Forget late-night library runs; now you can cram on the go, even while commuting on the Delhi Metro.
normalised: Are you gearing up for those dreaded exams? Don't sweat it! Exam prep apps are becoming the go to choice for students across India, from Jammu to Kanyakumari. Forget late night library runs; now you can cram on the go, even while commuting on the Delhi Metro.

unnormalised: These apps offer everything from mock tests mirroring the actual UPSC exam to personalized learning modules for CBSE students. Think of it as having a pocket-sized coaching center! Many offer bite-sized video lectures, perfect for those short attention spans.
normalised: These apps offer everything from mock tests mirroring the actual U P S C exam to personalized learning modules for C B S E students. Think of it as having a pocket sized coaching center! Many offer bite sized video lectures, perfect for those short attention spans.

unnormalised: One popular app, "StudySathi," even gamifies learning, rewarding you with points for completing modules. Who knew studying could be fun? With Onam around the corner, imagine enjoying a plate of delicious biryani while acing your exam prep. Several apps report a 20% increase in user scores after just 2 weeks of consistent use. So ditch the textbook mountain and download your way to success! Don't just rely on luck; rely on tech, beta!
normalised: One popular app, "StudySathi," even gamifies learning, rewarding you with points for completing modules. Who knew studying could be fun?
